Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are immediately followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed by SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers appearing before SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants in which SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurs at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are repeated more than three times within the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 3 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that precede any SW-Reviewer Agreed activity in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-AE Assign Reviewers appears without any subsequent SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in long-running variants (performance > 1,000,000 seconds)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executed by SYSTEM compared to other performers (though all appear to be SYSTEM, this validates consistency)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in first-round review phases versus revision rounds (e.g., before vs. after Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed within 7 days by a reviewer response (either SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurring after a Reviewer Invitation Reminder
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to total reviewer-related activities (including SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response, SW-Reviewer Unavailable) per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after an editor reassignment (e.g., following Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases
